TopicTitle: Consider adding a third runway going north to south.

Articles.Content:
It would be very nice to have all cardinal directions covered in terms of the runways. Additionally, the ability to be able to spawn either end of the runway would be nice.

Sidenote: Congrats on for science update. I held off on purchasing KSP2 until now and I can definitely say I am having a great time. Excited for the road ahead.
Honestly I adore that idea! Having a more dynamic looking space center in general would be appreciated as well. Maybe three runways one 45 degrees between NS/EW as well?

29 minutes ago, Sammys Stuffs said:

Maybe three runways one 45 degrees between NS/EW as well? 

Or maybe build craft that can turn. It's a space center, not international airport.

While I'm not directly opposing N-S runway, turning 90⁰ after liftoff doesn't sound very hard to do. And I do agree on picking the side.

1 hour ago, The Aziz said:

Or maybe build craft that can turn. It's a space center, not international airport.

While I'm not directly opposing N-S runway, turning 90⁰ after liftoff doesn't sound very hard to do. And I do agree on picking the side.

I'm sorry for being so upsetting. I just think it'd look nicer, not that it would be more practical. Turning a plane to face north at all is incredibly easy. It's just that the current KSP 2 KSC looks a little ugly just from being overly generic. Having more variance in runways would spice it up visually. I hope you have a lovely Morning/Evening/Night etc.
